overview: Your two bears, Tom Segura and Bert Krischner, sit down with hall of famer Warren Sapp and commentate the game LIVE. Drinking, smoking, singing, dancing, gambling, more than FOUR HOURS of uncensored content. Does Bert finally have competition in the drinking department? How uncomfortable can the bears make Sapp with their "original content"?
title: 2 Bears 1 Sapp
